hero.title: About Shiv Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Precision Manufacturing Since 1993
hero.description: With three decades of expertise, Shiv Brass has been a pioneering force in precision component manufacturing for automotive and aerospace industries. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives us to deliver exceptional precision parts that meet the most demanding specifications.

meta.title: Shiv Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of experience serving automotive and aerospace industries with high-quality brass components.

items.title: Foundation
items.description: Established Shiv Brass with a vision to provide high-precision brass components for critical industries

items.title: First Major Expansion
items.description: Expanded manufacturing facilities and invested in advanced CNC machining technologies

items.description: Achieved aerospace industry certifications, expanding into high-precision component manufacturing

items.title: Advanced CNC Machining Center
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machining capabilities for producing complex brass components with micron-level precision

items.content: Shiv Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of experience specializing in high-quality brass components for automotive and aerospace industries. Our commitment to technological innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction has positioned us as a trusted partner for complex manufacturing requirements.

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Comprehensive design and engineering analysis using advanced CAD/CAM technologies

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precision material sourcing and verification for optimal component performance

items.title: Precision Manufacturing
items.description: Advanced CNC machining with multi-axis capabilities for complex geometries

items.title: Quality Assurance
items.description: Rigorous multi-stage inspection using coordinate measuring machines and optical measurement systems

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Advanced surface finishing techniques including polishing, coating, and precision treatments

items.title: Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and traceable shipping with comprehensive documentation
